export_format.description: Six products with varying export formats. CareVue exports custom XML per patient (VistA-derived schema). ChartLogic products (EHR V1, EHR Classic, Patient Portal) export C-CDA XML plus scanned documents as PDFs. Wellsoft EDIS exports CCDA or CSV. PCG exports C-CDA (single patient via UI; bulk requires email to support@micro-officesystems.com).

documentation.table_or_resource_count_note: 143 VistA file definitions with 5,553 field entries — applies to CareVue only. ChartLogic/Wellsoft/PCG have no vendor-specific data dictionary (ChartLogic references HL7 C-CDA spec; Wellsoft data dictionary link is dead).

clinical.evidence: CareVue DD: PATIENT (File 2), PRESCRIPTION (File 52), PHARMACY PATIENT (File 55), GMRV VITAL MEASUREMENT (File 120.5), PROBLEM, LAB DATA, TIU DOCUMENT, V POV, V PROCEDURE, V IMMUNIZATION, V SKIN TEST, V EXAM, V TREATMENT, V HEALTH FACTORS. ChartLogic/PCG: C-CDA covers clinical data per USCDI v1.

secure_messages.evidence: Searched CareVue DD for message/inbox/communication/secure/portal — no secure messaging file found. PTF MESSAGE is a PTF (Patient Treatment File) message, not patient-provider messaging. ChartLogic/Wellsoft/PCG documentation doesn't mention messaging.

billing_financial.evidence: CareVue DD: AR DEBTOR (File 340), AR DATA QUEUE (File 348.4), ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE (File 430), V CPT (File 9000010.18), THIRD PARTY LIABILITY, WORKMAN'S COMPENSATION, GUARANTOR. ChartLogic/Wellsoft: not documented (C-CDA only).

insurance_coverage.evidence: CareVue DD: MEDICARE ELIGIBLE (File 9000003), POLICY HOLDER (File 9000003.1), MEDICAID ELIGIBLE (File 9000004), RAILROAD ELIGIBLE, PRIVATE INSURANCE ELIGIBLE (File 9000006), VAMB ELIGIBLE, PATIENT APPLICATIONS, THIRD PARTY LIABILITY. Also has COMMUNICATION NUMBER fields for insurance.

appointments_scheduling.evidence: CareVue DD: PATIENT APPOINTMENT INFO LOG (File 409.6), DAY SURGERY (File 9009012), VISIT (File 9000010), V EMERGENCY VISIT RECORD.

documents_images.evidence: CareVue DD: IMAGE (File 2005), MERGE IMAGES (File 15.4), TIU DOCUMENT (File 8925). ChartLogic: scanned documents and images exportable as PDFs.

audit_trails.evidence: CareVue DD: IMAGE AUDIT (File 2005.1), XXXMSC EHI EXPORT LOG (File 21517.2), BCMA MEDICATION VARIANCE LOG (File 53.78), BCMA MEDICATION LOG (File 53.79), MSCH IV INTEROPERABILITY LOG (File 21478), PTF TRANSACTION REQUEST LOG (File 45.87).

downloaded_files.description: CareVue EHI Export XSD schema (XML Schema Definition for the per-patient XML export format)
ZIP containing EHI_EXPORT.xsd (same content as .txt, packaged for download)
CareVue VistA data dictionary — 143 file definitions, 5,553 field entries with field names, numbers, descriptions, data types, and code sets
CareVue EHI export subdomain landing page
DEAD LINK — Pardot tracking URL expired. Returns error text: 'This content isn't available.' This was the data dictionary for Wellsoft's CSV export.
Full certifications page with all 6 product sections including EHI export documentation text
Costs and disclosures for certified Health IT (5 pages)

issues: Wellsoft EDIS CSV data dictionary link is dead (Pardot tracking URL expired) — no field-level documentation available for the CSV export format
ChartLogic products (EHR V1, EHR Classic, Patient Portal) provide no vendor-specific data dictionary — only reference the HL7 C-CDA specification
PCG bulk export requires emailing support@micro-officesystems.com — not self-service
PCG single-patient export is limited to one patient at a time via UI
Only CareVue has substantive EHI-specific documentation (XSD schema + 143-file VistA data dictionary)
ChartLogic/PCG C-CDA exports are limited to USCDI v1 data classes — may not constitute 'all EHI' as required by b(10)
summary: CareCloud operates 6 certified products under the Medsphere brand with widely varying EHI export documentation quality. CareVue (VistA-based) has excellent documentation: a formal XSD schema and a 4.3 MB data dictionary covering 143 VistA files and 5,553 fields including clinical, billing, insurance, scheduling, imaging, and audit data. The ChartLogic products and PCG offer only C-CDA exports with no vendor-specific data dictionary (just HL7 spec references). Wellsoft claims CSV export capability but its data dictionary link (Pardot-hosted xlsx) is dead. The massive documentation gap between CareVue and the other 5 products is notable — the non-CareVue products effectively just export standard C-CDA documents, which likely doesn't constitute 'all EHI' as required by 170.315(b)(10).
